info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 12 at 12:40AM CDT until June 12 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Austin/San Antonio TX
info.description:
FFWEWX
The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northeastern Bexar County in south central Texas... Central Comal County in south central Texas... West Central Guadalupe County in south central Texas... Central Hays County in south central Texas...
* Until 500 AM CDT.
* At 1240 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... San Antonio, Austin, New Braunfels, Schertz, Cibolo, Converse, Universal City, Live Oak, Selma, Dripping Springs, Wimberley, Canyon Lake Dam, Randolph AFB, San Antonio Int Airport, Canyon Lake, Alamo Heights, Windcrest, Terrell Hills, Bulverde and Garden Ridge.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 5:00 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 5:00 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Bexar, TX; Comal, TX; Guadalupe, TX; Hays, TX

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 12 at 12:40AM CDT until June 12 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Austin/San Antonio TX
info.description:

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 5:00 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 5:00 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Bexar, TX; Comal, TX; Guadalupe, TX; Hays, TX
